column4: does anyone know if the driver provided by ati for the x1300 can function in 9.10? it couldnt in 8.10 to 9.04...
anyone know if the ati fglrx driver for the x1300 can function in 9.10?
thanx. i was hoping it would. i am still being forced to use pclinuxos 2009. not my first choice, but it uses my ati driver. :(
because older chips are no longer supported , but unless you game, the open source driver works great
i tried the open source driver, made the screen funky and continuously crashed the pc.
hmm shouldnt , it works nice with x 1300
well, difficult to trouble shoot these things

maybe ill try it again then, maybe something happened since 9.04. but since windows with my driver and pclinuxos09 with the linux ati driver both work without hiccups, and then ubuntu with the open source driver is buggior than a swamp, i assumed it was the opensource driver
oh a lot has changed since 9.04 the drivers are much improved
thats great news. I am a gamer, but i can live without games. I just cant live without pc halting bugs.
you can play games too except a few like quake 4
also with tthe open source driver you get a nice graphical boot experience etc
thats impressive, because in 9.04, the open source driver could barely run the pc. Happy happy joy joy, LOL
flicker free boot by april release of 10.04
